attributes.title: WORST APP EVER. DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: After I got this app, I kept getting a bunch of calls from awful predators who are trying to find people to prey on and it was just AWFUL. Do NOT DOWNLOAD this app! Also, there’s this awful sight of a big fat huge disgusting awful Cheeto who is very stupid and bad at his job. It’s the WORST APP I’ve ever had!

attributes.title: Orange Daddy man 😰😰
attributes.review: HI! Dis Orange sherbet god is evil 😖 I got the app while doing Tiktok dances because why not and the Orange worshippers charged my house all at once :( I tried to hide but they where to fast and my parrot lost its life fighting off the oranges. Rip George. And everyone is out here being ORANGE I’m just trying to be a Woman out in dis country but the Oranges are to blinding.

attributes.title: no!
attributes.review: do NOT download this app. i opened it and ants started marching into my room in a straight line yelling at me! i dont even like ants in the first place and they had the audacity to start taking my BREADCRUMBS. this was a huge disappointment for me. would rate this zero stars if it was an option 🤬

attributes.title: sacrificed my weaves to the tré??
attributes.review: This app was absolutely horrific. I downloaded the app and when I opened an orange was on the screen talking in such a stupid way, it’s scared all three of the wigs that were on my head! The orange then said “ahhh yes three sacrifices to the tré have been made.” Now all my $0.50 wigs are gone. Smh.

attributes.title: I hate it here
attributes.review: This app is awful and it is named after a monster. Children are dying in cages, people are dying because of a virus, black people are getting killed by cops, women are being raped and are too scared to report it. Trump has done nothing to help these mattered and Trump is a fascist white supremacist.

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: This app makes you put in personal information. People have been saying that they have been getting calls. So I believe they are selling information To telemarketers. And I don’t want anyone’s personal information at risk. ⚠️DONT PUT YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION⚠️

attributes.title: just not for me 🤷‍♀️
attributes.review: Came here to support my big juicy orange President but the app took 9 hours to load 😢 also once it downloaded I couldn’t even get into the app to see my beautiful racist President’s content 😭 v disappointed in this app, really should be taken off the App Store 😏

attributes.title: IF I COULD RATE THIS ZERO STARS I WOULD
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app in an attempt to support our president only to realize he is probably selling my information to Chinese or Russian Intel!!! 🤬 
In the app he asks for your personal phone number???? why would he need that!! i highly encourage everyone to DELETE THIS APP FROM THEIR PHONE.

attributes.title: horrible ✨🧚
attributes.review:
this is by far one of the worst apps i’ve ever had to use. i HIGHLY recommend NOT downloading this! with that... the person surrounding this app is WORSE! we do not need the face of america a pedo, immature, disgusting human! this app is just terrible and un helpful! 
you will regret downloading it!

attributes.title: This is the worst app to ever be made
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what he was about but it took MONTHS to install really hard to work and it kept logging me off. So hard to read the small letters and had to many spelling mistakes. HORRIBLE! -1/10 DO NOT recommend!
